tva:BasicDescription.tva:Title: Dexter Season 7 Trailer
tva:BasicDescription.tva:Synopsis: Official trailer for Dexter season 7. Premieres on Showtime Sunday September 30th at 9PM ET/PT.

tva:Genre.tva:Name: Non-linear audio-video
tva:Genre.tva:Definition: Services where the interaction is based mostly around choosing alternate audio or video files - VOD and AOD, maybe combined with 2.1.1.15 (multi stream)

tva:HowRelated.tva:Name: Recommendation
tva:HowRelated.tva:Definition: The reference points to a resource recommended the provider of the current resource. The service provider considers there to be similarities between the currently described resource and the referenced resource. Example: This could provide access to previous or next episodes or to all episodes (the parent series as a whole). Suggestion to record a programme which the broadcaster recommends because of what the user is watching.It could also point to a Web site proposing related programmes ‘recommended’ by the service provider. A recommendation can be used to suggest content or services or services bundles with a similar subject.

tva:Review.tva:FreeTextReview: My skin be crawling an﻿ shit o.o
omg..﻿ no.
Finally...finally.﻿
That guy better not kill Angels﻿ sister
KIll Deb Kill that Bitch KIll Musuka KIll Your Neighbours KIll THEM ALL﻿ ... you must survive Dex :Harry's Voice: Dexter : I Will MORE BLOOD I LOVE THIS SERIE !!
wtf masuka﻿
When he﻿ is choking that guy, looks like he is in his own apartment.
Why is dexter using the micky mouse hat﻿ he got from the end of season 4
Thank you... Thank﻿ you.
I think Dex never kill Deb. But﻿ this season will be awesome like other.seasons...
can't wait! ﻿
dexter season 7 is where I﻿ think dexter is being hunted by the police. That would make for an awesome finale!

Passenger is considered by many people to be a gay﻿ BDSM themed song. Though, of course like most music, the lyrics are subjective and are open to interpretation. I really think Change was the perfect song for this trailer. Deb is changing. She now knows about Dexter's ... passenger. :)
Well, I didn't think of it﻿ that way. Gross, man. Gross.
I﻿ hate to say it but I have a feeling that deb is going to die this season.
Also, everything is about to change.﻿ She watched him change from man she wants, man she looks up to, to serial killer. Or at least murderer.
I think﻿ Dexter will end with Deb killing him

I can't decide whether they could go another season if Dex killed Deb.
Computer dude (whose name eludes me)﻿ clearly will end up on the table.

IDK why people are trying to guess what is about to happen.﻿ All i want to know is if Deb is going to actually have a nudity scene this season! I dont mean bareback. I mean full blown tit and bush shot!
Wow! Can't﻿ wait!!

The season with Julia Stiles was such pure garbage, it felt like aliens were conspiring to break﻿ my spirit, Dexter used to be the greatest show, first two seasons were mint, John Lithgow was awesome... Julia Stiles my God was that a travesty
Cant believe my eyes !﻿
This trailer has﻿ soooo many spoilers -___-
huh?﻿ where?
Wow!﻿ Looks like they've decided to advance the story from the end of season 2. I'm actually looking forward to this season of Dexter now. :)

Reviewer.Music: Got tons to share with you!
Got tons to share with you!
Got tons to share with you!

Reviewer.Books: The Lord of the Rings (by J.R.R. Tolkien), The Tragedy of Macbeth (by William Shakespeare), Paradise Lost (by John Milton), Lord of the Flies (by William Golding), and Choke (by Chuck Palahniuk).
Reviewer.Movies: The Godfather: Part II (Coppola, 1974); Rocky (Avildsen, 1976); Star Wars V: The Empire Strikes Back (Kershner, 1980); The Terminator (Cameron, 1984); Se7en (Fincher, 1994); Pulp Fiction (Tarantino, 1995); The Matrix (Wachowski, 1999); Fight Club (Fincher, 1999); The Lord of the Rings (Jackson, 2001-2003); and The Dark Knight (Nolan, 2008).
Reviewer.Music: Way down in the Hole (The Blind Boys of Alabama), Dammit (Blink-182), Lose Yourself (Eminem), Holiday (Green Day), Breaking the Habbit (Linkin Park), Johnny B. Goode (Mark Campbell), Shook Ones Pt. II (Mobb Deep), Gained the World (Morcheeba), The Sound of Silence (Simon & Garfunkel), and Eye of the Tiger (Survivor).
